name: Peng Pang!
description:
Peng Pang! is a game based on the popular game ping pong.

Peng Pang! allows you to play with your friends via LAN multiplayer.

Minimum and maximum players allowed: 2.

Controlls:

- W, S: Move your paddle up or down.
- Mouse: You can control the position of your paddle.
- Left Click: The paddle hits.
- Space: Spawn a new ball if you are the host player.
